companyInfo.Competitors: Allegiance Staffing, Manpower, Volt Information Sciences

jobDescription: Data Analyst One of our insurance clients, located in the North Shore-Andover area, is seeking a Data Analyst on a contract-to-permanent basis. This is a smaller company that is expanding quickly, so immediate availability is a must! This Data Analyst position requires someone with superb Excel skills and effective communication skills. If you would like to be considered for this role, please submit a copy of your resume today!  Responsibilities Creating pivot tables in Excel to manipulate data received from vendors Monitoring communications between the firm and outside parties Managing data storage and documentation to track the status of projects Creating and developing new reporting methods; providing input to internal stakeholders to help create best practices Organizing and cleaning large data sets Qualifications Four year college degree strongly preferred but not requiredPrevious experience as a Data Analyst, specifically in health care or insurance, is strongly preferred Must have excellent Excel skills, particularly in creating pivot tables and using VLOOKUP Ability to multi-task with focus and accuracyExperience using complex database systems Interest in working with data, especially financial information, is a major plus GD301
